channel.title: Posts on SWIFT-HEP
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on SWIFT-HEP

item.title: SWIFT-HEP workshop on 28-30 March 2022
item.description: The third SWIFT-HEP workshop will be held in Durham on 28-30 March. The workshop is co-located with the GridPP47 meeting, a joint session is planned as well as common social activities. A dedicated SWIFT-HEP workshop will be held over 1.5 days.

item.title: SWIFT-HEP workshop on 2-3 November 2021
item.description: The second SWIFT-HEP workshop was held in person at Imperial College on 2-3 November. The meeting agenda is in Indico.

item.title: SWIFT-HEP starts!
item.description: SWIFT-HEP started on 1 April 2021 as a new project to provide software for HEP experiments. STFC press release.
